Gulp SVG Sprites (4 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • heart


    <svg class="icon heart"><use xlink:href="#heart"></use></svg>

  • heart-border


    <svg class="icon heart-border"><use xlink:href="#heart-border"></use></svg>

  • heart-form


    <svg class="icon heart-form"><use xlink:href="#heart-form"></use></svg>

  • search


    <svg class="icon search"><use xlink:href="#search"></use></svg>

Generated by Gulp Svg Sprites - Preview page courtesy of iconizr.
